stripped_text: If no installed programs have been trashed this turn, you must trash 1 installed program as an additional cost to use this hardware. trash: Install 1 program from your heap, paying 3 credits less.
text:
If no installed programs have been trashed this turn, you must trash 1 installed program as an additional cost to use this hardware.
[trash]: Install 1 program from your heap, paying 3[credit] less.
title: Simulchip
